name: The Neighbor
description:
Your neighbor hasn't been seen in almost two years. He was last seen the night before an alleged UFO sighting in your neighborhood. Most believe he is dead, but you suspect he is alive and hiding something. And tonight, you set out to prove it.  

CONTROLS

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Left Mouse - Take Picture
  • Right Mouse - Aim
  • Scroll - Adjust Zoom
  • Spacebar - Menu
